ModMetaData.name: Facial Stuff 0.17.1.1
ModMetaData.author: Killface
ModMetaData.description:
This mod aims to provide more visual individuality for your colonists. - 10 newly defined skin colors instead of the vanilla 6. - hair genetics according to real life. - includes a few selected trend colors of 5501. - 30+ different beards. - new eyes and brows for both sexes. - Added vanilla hair styles with 10 steps of hair loss. - Hair is merged on the head graphic, thus visible with worn hats.
+ includes a modified version of 'Spoonshortage's Rimworld Hairstyles 1.2' by spoonshortage + includes a modified version of 'Nackblad Inc Rimhair 1.1' by nackblad
REQUIRES HUGSLIB
Special thanks to Fluffy for the FaceStyling bench (adapted from 'Clutter') Uses the detour code from Orion's 'Hospitality'
2017-05-17 - 0.17.1 added basic integration for other species, faces are now added via def patch 2016-12-15 - updated Spoon's hairs 2016-10-14 - updated tribal hairs from NackbladIncRimhair
